timeline.message: Fixed potential non termination in PositionBuilder
Added test for specific instance that previously caused non termination

timeline.bodyText: is there a reason for the timeout?
timeline.author: MartinWitt

replies.bodyText: The test specifically tests to make sure PositionBuilder terminates in a reasonable time. The existing bug caused non-termination, therefore if it doesn't terminate in a reasonable time, we assume it to be non-terminating
replies.author: Strum355
